verses.content: Ka naupa, ka thu hi kawl la, Ka thupêkhai hi nangmaa chun siekhâwl rawh.
Ka thupêkhai hi kawlin khawsa la, Ka închûktirna chu i mitnautê angin;
I kutpârhaia chun khuopde la, I lungril phêk chunga chun ziek rawh.
Varna kuoma chun, “Nang chu ka farnu i nih,” ti la, Hrietthiemna chu i laibungah inbûk rawh.
Hmêlmak nuhmeia inthawka an kawl theina ding chein, Hmêlmak a thuhaia zaihlêmtu chea inthawk chun.
Ka in tukverah, Ka thirlêna chun ka en hlak sih a.
Chuongchun, mi mâwlhai laia chun ka en a, Tleirâwlhai laia chun, Hrietthiemna bo tlangvâl ka hmuh a.
Ama chun amanu tuol kawtthlêra chun fein, Amanu in lampui chu a hraw a,
Chu ni zântiengah, thimtham hnuoiah; Zân mâwk inthim mup hnuoia chun.
Chun, ngai ta, chutaka chun nuhmei, Nawchizawr inthuoma inthuom, lungril inlêktak ân tuokpui a.
Amanu chu mi bautam ngalhrâttak a na, A ina hrim a ke chu a um hman ngai nawh a.
Kawtthlêra le khawlai dunghaia umin, Kil tina inchânin a nghâk zing a.
Chuongchun, amanu chun ama chu a man a, a fâwp tah a, Chun, hmêl iniemtakin a kuomah a hril tah a;
“Inremna thilinhlânhai inthâwina inhlân ding ka nih a, Hi ni hin ka thutiemhai chu kân thien tah a.
Chuleiin, nangma tuok ding chein ka hung suok a nih; Taimataka i hmêl zawng dingin, chuongchun, ka hmu suok ta che hi.
Ka khum chu puon cheimawi inkhumin ka chei tah a, Puon ṭielhai Aiguptaa khâwng chun.
Ka khum chu riminhnik ka theh a, Murra le, beraw le, thingzungthakin.
Hung la, zingkâr chenin ei hmangaina sipzak lâng ei ta, Hmangainahaiin eini chu inhnêm ei tih,
Ka pasal chu inah a um nawh a, Khuol ram hlatakah a fe ta sih a.
Ama chun tangka fûn a chawi a, Thla lir pha leh hung tlung a tih,” tiin.
Amanu thu hril ṭha chun ama chu ân pêktir tah a; A hmûrhai zaihlêmna chun ama chu a tirlui tah a.
Ama chun amanu chu a zui nghâl a, Bâwngchal sathattu kuoma fe ang elin, Annawleh, invêt sukdikna dinga thîrkawl bun ang elin,
Thalin a thin chu a sunthleng hmakhata, Vatein châng a baw ang elin, A nun thlengna ding a nih ti hre loin.
Chuleiin, tuhin ka nau- pasalhai, mi lo ngai unla, Ka baua thuhai hi pawisa ta u.
A lampuihaia chun in lungril innghat naw sienla, A lampuihai chu zui bawk naw ro.
Mi tamtak chu hliemin a peithlûk ta sih a; Anih, a sukhlumhai po po chu sipai râlhrâthai an nih.
Amanu in chu Seol fena lampui a na, Thina pindana lûtthla chu.
